resources.string: Select the duration for this widget:
Alarm will ring again in 1 hour.

Time meds with Cricket's Alarm widget.


Choose CricketsAlarm from Widgets

Configure alarm time

Just tap on the widget: alarm is set up.


You just need to know this:


We use the default system alarm volume and ringtone

When the alarm rings, you can shake the handset to snooze it
The 'snooze' time is one hour.

Credits


If you meet a bug or have a feature request, you can contact me here :

 https://github.com/alijc/CricketsAlarm/issues


(With many thanks to Thibault Jouannic. https://github.com/thibault/Napply)
